lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: John,Carol,Megan & Ben
lender.loan_because: It's a nice felling to be able to contribute and help someone less fortunate
lender.occupational_info: Satisfying, grounding, wonderful.

lender.name: Alfred
lender.loan_because: I want the blessings given to me to be passed on to those who need it.

lender.name: Nikolas
lender.loan_because: someone has made me realize that I could use my own resources for something worthwhile.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I like to help those who are trying to help themselves and their family have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Working to improve schools so that children get a better education.

lender.name: VictoriaLynne
lender.loan_because: I feel good knowing I can share the bounty in my life with someone in a very positive, empowering way. I am not giving someone a fish, I am helping them to catch their own.
lender.occupational_info: I am a single mother of 3 that is blessed with a wonderful family, a great job, a good home and a strong faith.

lender.name: Ron A. and Judy Mae
lender.loan_because: "...remember the words of the Lord Jesus, that He Himself said, 'It is more blessed to give than to receive.'" (Acts 20:35) To God be the glory!
lender.occupational_info: Anything the Lord gives us to do.

lender.name: stephanie
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have the resources which enable others to help themselves, change their lives and change the world, one small loan at a time.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of librarians who help the public find answers and information to questions on all kinds of topics.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I live in a world of privilege and buying a goat for someone just doesn't cut it for my conscience. I want to help people who can help their whole community.

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: Kiva is proof that we can all make a difference

lender.name: Vic and Kathryn
lender.loan_because: We believe money is only as good as the happiness it can produce. We have both lived in and visited developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: Vic writes about history, literature, popular culture and mass media for newspapers, magazines, web sites and books. Kathryn prepares and prosecutes patent applications for a corporation.

lender.name: Coy
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people in need.
lender.occupational_info: Director of Technology Org

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I have so much already and it is important for me to learn to share more and to spread the notion sharing. Kiva is a great vehicle for these goals.
lender.occupational_info: I use experiences in the outdoors facilitate educational change in myself and in those with whom I travel.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I buy perishable goods for consumers in the United Sates.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I like to help things grow.
lender.occupational_info: I build computer tools that are used to manage businesses.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of my loan enabling someone to realize their dreams and facilitate their livelihood.
lender.occupational_info: I help people acheive success and fulfillment.

lender.name: Merryn
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance works. And contributing to your community how ever way you do it is a social duty.
lender.occupational_info:
I work in film and tv as a researcher, writer, assistant director and shooter producer. My passion is making documentaries on subcultures and cultural movements.
I'm also passionate about the arts and blog and participate in a non-profit arts organisation which assists emerging artists and small ticket events in Sydney, Australia.

lender.name: Far East Industry
lender.loan_because: I googled all available bad publicity about KIVA, and realized that the cliche downsides of a charity organization generally speaking do not apply to KIVA. One case of a corrupt MFI was reported by KIVA itself which is refreshingly honest in my opinion. We live in an imperfect world; as long as a proper mechanism is in place to limit or even prevent corruption in the (money)-supply chain, such organization has my vote. For now I will attribute a small percentage of my company's funds for charity to KIVA, until I can see tangible (micro) results.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Daniele
lender.loan_because: It's a small gesture that has tremendous impact.
lender.occupational_info: I translate texts from French into English to help my clients better serve their clients and expand their client base.

lender.name: Complete Heating
lender.occupational_info: Heating and air conditioning equipment.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Lisa and Anargyros
lender.loan_because: I've learned that you shouldn't go through life with a catchers mitt on both hands. You need to be able to throw something back. ~Maya Angelou

lender.name: Amanda
lender.occupation: Structural engineer...but now a nursing student

lender.name: Theresa & Dick Campbell
lender.loan_because: I cried when I had no shoes...until I met someone with no feet.

lender.name: Lynn & Melody
lender.loan_because: The IMF may or may not remain a viable finanacial entity on a global basis. The opportunity to fund a peer-to-peer business loan makes the most 'street' sense to me.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to
lender.occupational_info: Signwriter

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: I believe that MicroFinance is the best method of eliminating poverty in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help small businesses grow by providing funds based on their receivables and orders from qualified customers. Almost all of the KIVA clients could be my clients.

lender.name: Shen Heng
lender.loan_because: $25 is not even a donation (of which you won't know where your money ends up), it's a loan to help someone do something for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Providing design solutions in 3D, Web & Interactive Digital Media to businesses & individuals, for their business, service, product. We do this by packaging a myriad of consumer experience touchpoints from corporate identify, 3D visualisation, interactive websites, to application development for online, mobile and portable devices such as PDA / iPhone.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I love to travel, love seeing new places and new people and new things. I get to help people improve their lives through hard work (which I respect), and I also get to imagine living in their villages and towns even for just a few minutes.
lender.occupational_info: I buy properties/homes, fix them up and resell them for a profit.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: as a single parent, I know how hard it is to make it alone.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a credit union. A credit union is like a bank except that it is owned by the people who invest money in it. Those people combine their money together to help out other members in the community by giving loans and paying interest on their savings. I work in Marketing so I encourage people in the community to put their money in our credit union.

lender.name: Joy & David
lender.loan_because: We care

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: It can make a world of difference
lender.occupational_info: health related humanitarian

lender.name: Amit
lender.loan_because: Giving in a time of need is important to me.
lender.occupational_info: Studying and trying to save.

lender.name: Anders
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship as the solution to a lot of the world's problems, and I understand that money that might be small in one country can provide great means of changes in another part of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a web entrepreneur and work with a small team to create great web services.

lender.name: Jules
lender.loan_because: (mis)quoting paul kelly... "from little things big things grow!"

lender.name: Deaton
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who are working hard to support themselves and their loved ones.
lender.occupational_info: I create an environment at work that supports others to use their talents and skills to create products and services to sell AND to be satisfied with the quality of what they produce.

lender.name: Bengt
lender.loan_because: I want to do my share of contribution to a better world.
lender.occupational_info: Working with telecommunications, i.e. contributing to communication between people.

lender.name: Lori
lender.occupation: Jackson Liberty High School Interact Club

lender.name: DoanThanhThieuNien
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others, contributing in small effort, in time of need, especially for the people in the underdeveloping country, to help better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Advising the potential customers to save money for their telecommunications services and acquiring potential business partners to join my team for a better financial stability future.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to need a little financial help to start a small business or a new business project.
lender.occupational_info: I specialize in body centered care for people with trauma histories.

lender.name: zdhacz
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Romulus Cristea
lender.occupational_info: Journalist; public relations

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I believe in this

lender.name: Ross and friends
lender.loan_because: In 1963-65 I was a Peace Corps Volunteer Geography HS teacher in Maiduguri, Nigeria. Later, in 1969-73, my wife Elaine and I returned to work for Ford Foundation in Lagos, where our three kids where born.
lender.occupational_info: From 2003-09, I have taught geography to young and older working American students at Austin Community College in cen- tral Texas. My students have learned about various cultures including Nigerians, and some have made loans to KIVA microentrepreneurs.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I like knowing I can help others achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am a project manager for an environmental consulting firm.

lender.name: Rebekah
lender.loan_because: I believe in opportunity for all.
lender.occupational_info: I love people. I truly do. And more than anything, I love telling our stories.

lender.name: Ian
lender.occupational_info: I teach English.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: because there simply isn't a good reason as to why i shouldn't
lender.occupational_info: Currently working towards a degree in Elementary Education here at Michigan State University.

lender.name: Buzz
lender.loan_because: I know my small contribution can make a huge impact in someones life.

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone else who is trying to make their life, and those around them, better.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a nuclear power plant, developing improvement projects, and business planning.

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people. I believe that independence comes from interdependence.
lender.occupational_info: Work as a consultant in Information Technology.

lender.name: Zak
lender.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place for everyone when I grow up.

lender.name: Josue
lender.loan_because: people deserve the opportunity to make something of themself.

lender.name: Team M
lender.loan_because: Teaching our family about how to help other people.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: I organize workers who have no voice!

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: My husband and I hope to help people help themselves by encouraging entrepreneurship and good management.
lender.occupational_info: Although I have now stopped working, my job as a microbiologist entailed diagnosing bacterial, fungal, and parasitic infections.

lender.name: Shuai
lender.occupation: Director of a creative reuse nonprofit
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to have some extra cash that I could loan with.
lender.occupational_info: I help educate about reuse and creativity, divert over 200 tons of materials from the landfill and support teachers and artists by supplying them with affordable (or free) materials. check out scrap-sf.org for more details

lender.name: Joan0
lender.loan_because: Way to go Jake!

lender.name: dave
lender.loan_because: I think it's important to help people help themselves.The feeling of achievement and self worth is very important and confidence building .All these people asking for loans on Kiva work hard and deserve to grow their businesses in order to provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I write songs and people sing them , sometimes I sing them (not too well).I play the guitar every day.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I used to work under contract to the government, mostly writing regulations. Now I am developing a board game.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.

lender.name: Annette & Robert
lender.loan_because: Giving is the foundation of all of life. Thank you Kiva for creating a program that allows us to share around the world. There is too much poverty in our world. It makes no sense. Giving, gratitude, caring.
lender.occupational_info: We are both creative individuals creating in education, illustrated stories, publishing, web site development and the fine arts.

lender.name: Barry and Diane
lender.loan_because: We feel so fortunate in our lives and the richness we share with our family and friends. This is a small way of giving back.

lender.name: jen
lender.loan_because: i want to support female entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Pablo & Charlotte
lender.loan_because: We know are very lucky to have what we have and we want to make a difference with families who are less lucky tan ours.
lender.occupational_info: Growing up and becoming citizens of the world

lender.name: Annette
lender.loan_because: I want to support some of the small business people around the world who are working hard to improved their lives and the lives of their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse who provides health care to new refugees when they arrive in Canada.

lender.name: Thomas Pleines
lender.loan_because: I choose to do what I can.
lender.occupational_info: The history of the United States of America at the high school level would be my domain.

lender.name: Denise & Garcia
lender.loan_because: because we are all in this together.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to do a little bit to help a few individuals improve their situation. Also, because I've been very lucky in where and when I was born and owe at least this to a few others.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies set up their business software.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I feel the need to help others less fortunate than I.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school 5 days a week and learn cooking skills, french, physical education, language arts, math, science, and geography.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I believe a personal connection, like the ones Kiva facilitates, are essential to alleviating global poverty.

lender.name: Riley
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to help someone in need.

I want to support education and health.
Education is the single most important way to make a better life.
Number two and three is also education. And with a proper education people have a better chance to take care their health

lender.name: Walt & Sooz
lender.loan_because: We feel very fortunate to be able to do so.
lender.occupational_info: Walt works part time in engineering. He likes to fish and cut wood. Susan's job in child care food service is shopping, cooking, and paperwork. She is also a mosaic artist.

lender.name: Marcy
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate and want to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: I help manage public health clinics.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: It only takes a little to have a big impact in someone else's life.

lender.name: The Wrights etc...
lender.loan_because: Everybody should!

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I would like to help those who work hard to help themselves and their families.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to get involved and help people less fortunate.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I don't have much, but I want to share and help others when I can.

lender.name: Jane & Dennis
lender.loan_because: Our family has been blessed in so many ways. We'd like to be able to contribute to the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a manager at a consumer package goods company. My husband is retired.

lender.name: Pedro & Maria
lender.loan_because: We want to change the world!
lender.occupational_info:
Pedro Vicente is a computer science engineer.
Maria Corts Ferreira is a doctor.

lender.name: Friedrich
lender.loan_because: I earn enough to give a part to others
lender.occupational_info: i am head of a company that copies tv-programms and films into digital format

lender.name: Fernando
lender.loan_because: I like the Kiva concept, people who work for themselfs, and those on beauty jobs, or computer related
lender.occupational_info: making things done and running with servers and computers, help people who work with them, and innovation

lender.name: Oliver
lender.loan_because: I think it's better to grow an own business than depend on donations of others
lender.occupational_info: development of measurement devices for traffic law enforcement

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate in life and I believe in the tremendous spirit of entrepreneurship.

lender.name: The Wolff Family
lender.loan_because: We want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: Teach and do research.

lender.name: Debbie's Family
lender.loan_because: My family has Lutherans, Roman Catholics, Christians of many types, and some who find spirituality in the good, green Earth. We decided to invest in the world, rather than deal with the rat race of consumerism and materialism. This Kiva site is our gift to one another.
lender.occupational_info: We are teachers, engineers, doctors, nurses, businessmen, salesmen, carpenters, fishermen, and mothers and fathers.

lender.name: Darren & Tammy
lender.loan_because:
We are leaving Kiva due to their shift away from their stated mission and values, which were what attracted us to Kiva in the first place. We are disappointed with Kiva's shift in values to include First World borrowers. We feel strongly that the situation for so many Americans is truly lamentable, and it is shameful that US leaders have allowed financial, healthcare, education and housing problems to get so far out of control, but these are all problems we Americans can (and should) fix for ourselves, and we cannot ask entrepreneurs in the world's poorest regions to compete with US borrowers for funding.
We actively support US programs to help America's poor and the families of her fallen heroes, and we agree that the US should start by taking care of its own poor, but we disagree that it is Kiva lenders' place to fill the gap.
We will not lend through Kiva until the organization returns to its original values and stated mission of alleviating world poverty by providing microlending resources to the world's most impoverished areas. If Kiva makes the necessary course correction to return to its core values by limiting its borrowers to Third World entrepreneurs without access to traditional banking resources, we will happily return.

lender.name: Jari
lender.loan_because: Other people should be given a chance to reach a reasonable standard of living regardless of where they happen to live.
lender.occupational_info: Trying to find the most major problems from computer programs before they are released to be used by end users.

lender.name: Pastor Bob
lender.occupational_info:
Christ-centered, non-denominational web-based church, we offer online chat, post prayer requests,
and we have links to excellent Christian resources & open to everybody.
Help, hope, healing & deliverance for hurting people. Spiritual growth & Personal development

lender.name: Caitlin
lender.loan_because: These people need help and I have the means to help them

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to help other people over and over again. As a teacher and future mother I want to demonstrate to my children how important it is to be selfless, merciful, and generous.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school students in grades 9-12 how to read and play music. We sing, play piano and guitar. I also teach high school band where we perform all kinds of classical music.

lender.name: Emily
lender.occupation: Student at Point Loma Nazarene University

lender.name: chupachappy
lender.loan_because: All human beings deserve better lives, so I want to help them if only slightly.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I want to give to those with less than me, something I learned from my Dad
lender.occupational_info: Tattoo Shop Owner

lender.name: Max, Quin, Mark
lender.loan_because: My partner and I want our son to see that you CAN make a difference in the world if you just TRY.

lender.name: Cathal
lender.loan_because: I can see what I've donated doing good for real people; it's not a give-and-forget affair, it's a self-affirming action that shows you all the good a little helping hand can do.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a lab, finding new ways to fight difficult forms of cancer that don't respond to drugs or can't be operated on. My particular area of research is in Gene Therapy, which aims to undermine or cure cancer by instructing the body to fight it more efficiently, or by tricking the tumour into killing itself quietly and safely.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: many people have given me a hand up when I needed it and I want to keep the karma going.
lender.occupational_info: I test fruits, vegetables, and food products for chemical contamination. I also help people minimize the use of synthetic fertilizers and pesticides on crops.

lender.name: Petrina
lender.loan_because: to teach my children the gift of giving. To show them how hard work and believing in the goodness of everyone around the world can help no matter what circumstance may lay ahead.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I and my daughter Jessica believe this is a great way to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I work with authors, helping them with their manuscripts.

lender.name: MrioM
lender.loan_because: I want to give tools to help people arround the world that diserve it, not just money, but a chance to build a future with hard work.

lender.name: Bushra Farooq
lender.loan_because: we can afford to and to be grateful. It feels great also.

lender.name: Kuo-Wei
lender.loan_because: It allows me to connect with people across the world, reminds me of our common humanity, and instructs me in having a grateful spirit. All the material wealth in the world isn't worth anything if it doesn't effect love and positive change in the lives of other people.
lender.occupational_info: Healer

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: The entrepreneurial spirit is the most admirable, courageous, and ambitious force.

lender.name: Arthur
lender.loan_because: I admire people who are working hard to build something.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to plan for and invest toward their financial goals

lender.name: LILA
lender.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I believe one person can make a real difference in the lives of others and that people trying to better their lives should be supported.

lender.name: Dianne
lender.occupational_info: teacher

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I am originally from Nicaragua and I would like to give back to my birth country.

lender.name: Trace
lender.loan_because: To help people that are poor, sick or don't have what I have!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I realize how very fortunate I am to have this opportunity to help others. I have enough. It is time for me to give back to the world that has given so much to me.
lender.occupational_info: I sell telecommunications services to telecom service providers around the world.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I study the migration and movements of endangered leatherback turtles. The turtles have instruments attached to them that allow me to track them by satellite. Using information about where the turtles spend their time, I look at human activities in those same areas, and predict whether the human activities are likely to endanger the turtles. My job is to try to reduce the number of leatherback turtles harmed or killed by human activiies.

lender.name: The Dog Wizard
lender.loan_because: It is nice to be able to help entrepreneurs around the world succeed and make a difference for their family and community.
lender.occupational_info: The Dog Wizard is a dog training company. Our goal is to teach dogs obedience, so that they get more freedom and live the life they deserve.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I think one of the best ways to make change in the world is to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: For over 40 years, I worked in a university (MIT), on communications and policy issues. I am now retired.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.occupational_info: I am attending Point Loma Nazarene University with the intent to go into the health care profession

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help my neighbor.

lender.name: Bettina
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed so abundantly by God with so much, I have to give to others. Because I love sewing & have been blessed with so much in that area of my life, I want to help women around the world who use their skills with a sewing machine to support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a store that sells fabric used for quilt making. We also have classes & sell books & patterns.

lender.name: Kyril
lender.loan_because: My wife and I feel that it is important to give back when you can.
lender.occupational_info: Local banking

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Life has been good to me... So I want to help other people to have a better life and who can really benefit from my assistance.
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: there, but for fortune, go you and I.
lender.occupational_info: I am a former lawyer, retired because of a disability, who makes all types of quilts, including art quilts, by private commission. I also quilt for charity and for my friends and family.

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: I want to do my bit.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of social work.

lender.name: Maya Andrea
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed to have been born in a place, time, and culture that enables me to live in comfort. I believe that sharing is one way to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am an actor, artist and healing facilitator. My work in the world is to live in Love.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: So many people helped me when I was a struggling-to-survive single mother.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children and adults how to use computers.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I feel connected to real, individual people. I am so happy to have already helped 5 people who have quickly repaid 100%! I have 4 more active loans. I am so glad I decided to do this rather than Christmas grab bags at work 2 years ago!
lender.occupational_info: Grad School is keeping me busy! Look at my new website!!

lender.name: Bryan & Sandy
lender.loan_because: We are all connected and we should all help each other when it's possible.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.occupational_info: I work with an ophthalmologist, an eye doctor that helps treat eye disease, particularly retinal diseases.

lender.name: Yvette & Willie Jr.
lender.loan_because: We live in one world...Therefore we are all one family. Being a part of Kiva gives me a wonderful opportunity to show my son and the children I work with that they ALL can make a difference. God Bless Kiva and all those who benefit from it!
lender.occupational_info: I work with the youth in our community encouraging them to build good character qualities and get involved in community outreach projects. Our youth are our future.... They have the power to make our world a better place.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: Helping people achieve more than they can on their own is something that we have all benefited from at one time or another.
lender.occupational_info: I own (partly) and manage a large retail store/chain. We buy and sell used and new DVDs, Video Games, CDs, and other things of that nature.

lender.name: K K
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by Prof Yunus and the Grameen Bank's activities.
lender.occupational_info: I hope that in a way my small contributions can make a difference to improve the lives of the people who need it.

lender.name: David and Diane
lender.loan_because: with Kiva we can see who our donations help.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to share, across boundaries. We are all part of one large community and if I can help a brother or sister a little bit, I'd like to do that.

lender.name: Wilda
lender.loan_because: If I can, why not?

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help people, and it's way more useful than me spending it on beer & tacos.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: i want to help

lender.name: The Phillips
lender.loan_because: We can
lender.occupational_info: Medical Sales

lender.name: Gretchen
lender.loan_because: Because $25 can make a difference.

lender.name: Caitlin
lender.loan_because: this is a great idea, and you can help many people over and over with just $20.

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: Philanthopy is the greatest weath.
lender.occupational_info: I have been specializing in Finance and Economics for 10 years, but have been a student of Finance since 1992. I'm always interested in finding ways to employ financial solutions that can make a difference.

lender.name: Camellia
lender.loan_because: I want to honor God.

lender.name: daximo
lender.loan_because: i love everybody
lender.occupational_info: i'm a dog - i do what dogs do - love.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I believe that with a little help women can accomplish a lot.
lender.occupational_info: I work with IT, both software and hardware.

lender.name: Tracey
lender.occupation: owner of a restaurant, dog behavorist & trainer
lender.loan_because: I feel good helping others and I know that have been blessed with good fortune to have been born in the U.S. and hope that my small contributions will help those in places where life is much harder than mine. I believe in supporting hard-workers.

lender.name: Brendan
lender.loan_because: I was lucky enough to be born to affluent parents in an affluent nation. I believe that everyone deserves a chance at prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: I teach writing to university students

lender.name: Lucy
lender.occupational_info: I work with teachers and schools to help them use technology more effectively.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I traveled a lot in developing countries and KIVA is a great way to give back. I am eager to support the entrepreneurial spirit, world-wide.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an Research Assistant at the Freie University Berlin, FU Berlin, Chair of Prof. Faltin, Entrepreneurship Education

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate myself, receiving help many times for starting or expanding my businesses over the years, and this seems like an easy way to pay it back just a little.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small business myself, supplying packaging materials to larger companies.

lender.name: Marceli
lender.loan_because: Is there anything better to do?

lender.name: GSpier
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Filipe
lender.occupational_info: I'm a software developer of a major portuguese telecom company. I develop software for education and training using the web (e-learning)

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I enjoy seeing people succeed for themselves and for those they love.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help people make sense of the difficult times in their lives, and to be truly grateful for the good times.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be in a position to help others achieve their dreams. I feel like this is the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I work to make new medicines to help cure and prevent disease. Currently, my work focuses on cancer drugs, but I have worked on drugs for HIV, as well as, many vaccines in the past.

lender.name: Ida
lender.loan_because: Be kind, show compassion, help others... It is as simple as that.

lender.name: Michael and Yvette
lender.loan_because: I believe in personal and community empowerment.
lender.occupational_info: I give my students tools to understand the world around them and the society they live in. I teach them how to think critically so that they can make an impact on their local and global communities.

lender.name: Paulo
lender.loan_because: It feels good!

lender.name: Antnio
lender.loan_because: I can
